mapper.select:
select aa.* from ( select a.htseq, a.htName, a.htAddress, a.htcountry, a.htDesc, a.htDelNy, a.htRegDate, a.htReviseDate, a.htNotice, a.htMap, a.htInclusionItems, a.htNameSearch, a.htPriceSearch, a.htStarSearch, a.htClassSearch, a.htRestaurantNy, a.htSpaNy, a.htFitnessCenterNy, a.htPoolNy, a.htloungeNy, a.htStockRoomNy, a.htParkingNy, a.htShuttleBusNy, a.htBreakfastNy, a.htRoomServiceNy, a.htElseNy, c.htrseq, c.htrRoomName, c.htrRoomPrice, c.htrStay, c.bedoption, c.aircondNy, c.bathNy, c.tvNy, c.wifiNy, c.coffeeNy, c.hotel_seq
order by a.htseq desc ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

mapper.select: select a.htseq, a.htName, a.htAddress, a.htcountry, a.htDesc, a.htDelNy, a.htRegDate, a.htReviseDate, a.htNotice, a.htMap, a.htInclusionItems, a.htNameSearch, a.htPriceSearch, a.htStarSearch, a.htClassSearch, a.htRestaurantNy, a.htSpaNy, a.htFitnessCenterNy, a.htPoolNy, a.htloungeNy, a.htStockRoomNy, a.htParkingNy, a.htShuttleBusNy, a.htBreakfastNy, a.htRoomServiceNy, a.htElseNy, c.htrseq, c.htrRoomName, c.htrRoomPrice, c.htrStay, c.bedoption, c.aircondNy, c.bathNy, c.tvNy, c.wifiNy, c.coffeeNy, c.hotel_seq from hotel a left join (select * from hotelroom b order by b.htrRoomPrice limit 1) c on c.hotel_seq = a.htseq where 1=1 AND a.htseq = #{htseq}
